src.camera.CameraInterface module¶

class src.camera.CameraInterface.CameraInterface(config)[source]¶

Bases: src.main.Module.Module

A super class for camera related modules. Holding key information like camera intrinsics and extrinsics,

in addition to setting stereo parameters.

Example 1: Setting a custom source frame while specifying the format of the rotation. Note that to set config
parameters here, it has to be in a child class of CameraInterface.
{

“module”: “camera.CameraLoader”, “config”: {

“path”: “<args:0>”, “file_format”: “location rotation/value _ _ _ fov _ _”, “source_frame”: [“X”, “-Z”, “Y”], “default_cam_param”: {

“rotation”: {
“format”: “forward_vec”

}, “fov_is_half”: true

}

}

}

Configuration:

Properties per cam pose:

_cam2world_matrix_from_cam_extrinsics(config)[source]¶

Determines camera extrinsics by using the given config and returns them in form of a cam to world frame transformation matrix.

Parameters:config – The configuration object.
Returns:The cam to world transformation matrix.
_insert_key_frames(cam, cam_ob, frame_id)[source]¶

Insert key frames for all relevant camera attributes.

Parameters:
  • cam – The camera which contains only camera specific attributes.
  • cam_ob – The object linked to the camera which determines general properties like location/orientation
  • frame_id – The frame number where key frames should be inserted.
_set_cam_extrinsics(cam_ob, config)[source]¶

Sets camera extrinsics according to the config.

Parameters:
  • cam_ob – The object linked to the camera which determines general properties like location/orientation
  • config – A configuration object with cam extrinsics.
_set_cam_intrinsics(cam, config)[source]¶

Sets camera intrinsics from a source with following priority

  1. from config function parameter if defined
  2. from custom properties of cam if set in Loader
  3. default config
    resolution_x/y: 512 pixel_aspect_x: 1 clip_start: : 0.1 clip_end : 1000 fov : 0.691111
Parameters:
  • cam – The camera which contains only camera specific attributes.
  • config – A configuration object with cam intrinsics.
